My Projects

Let me share with you a few things I've worked on...

What's in your fridge?

Have you ever wondered what foods you could make with the ingredients lying around your house? Well with this app you can simply list out the ingredients that you have. Once you click submit you will get back a gallery of dishes that you can prepare yourself.
This website was built with the help of 3 other developers for our first school project.

JS | Ajax | API

Github Project

Liri Node App

Liri is similar to Apple's SIRI however it is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. Basically what that means is it will take in basic commands and output their answers. Liri is connected to various APIs to allow it to grab relevant data pertaining to the command that was asked of it. When a valid command is passed to liri, liri will search the API that is connected to that specific command.

Node | Axios | API

Project Github

Stargate Trivia Game

This is a simple trivia game focused around the epic Stargate Atlantis series. Go through the questions and try to get each of the 5 questions correct.

HTML/CSS | JS

Project Github

Terra-Mater

Terra Mater (Latin for _Mother Earth_) is a community-built database that allows users to search, favorite, create new plant data and care information in order to better care for their own plants.

Handlebars | Node | MySQL | Passport

Project Github
